topics.body:
I wish Tomodachi Life gave you the option to send travelers to your friends' islands. It can take ages until I Streetpass someone with the game, and besides, what is the point of the island address otherwise? I wonder if it's something they can implement in a game update; I cannot fathom why else there are distinct island addresses for any other reason.

EDIT: I don't know how, but I mistook this for the video game thread.
